constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 35 (Friday, February 25, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DOGGETT:
H.R. 6835.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8
[Page H1148]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: No Most Favored Nation Trading with Russia Act
